knimeNode.name: OrientDB Connection
knimeNode.shortDescription: The node creates a database connection.

fullDescription.intro: Opens a database connection based on the input settings. More information: https://orientdb.com/docs/last/Console-Command-Connect.html . Node supports only 'remote' mode of connection.
fullDescription.option: Number of multiple connections available during the session.
Type connection, database location and port information.
Name of the database to connect.
Option to connect using Knime credentials.
